mapper.select: SELECT a.es_idx, b.or_dte, DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') AS years, DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%m') AS MONTH, SUM( IFNULL(es_cnt1,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt2,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt3,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt4,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt5,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt6,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt7,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt8,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt9,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt10,0) ) AS orderCnt, SUM(pr_re_cnt) AS prodCnt from sm_estimate a JOIN sm_orders b ON a.es_idx = b.es_idx JOIN sm_work_order c ON b.or_idx = c.or_idx JOIN sm_prod_result d ON c.wo_idx = d.wo_idx JOIN sm_delivery e ON b.or_idx = e.or_idx WHERE DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') GROUP BY MONTH ORDER BY or_dte

SELECT a.es_idx, b.or_dte, DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') AS years, DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%m') AS MONTH, SUM( IFNULL(es_cnt1,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt2,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt3,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt4,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt5,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt6,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt7,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt8,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt9,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt10,0) ) AS orderCnt from sm_estimate a JOIN sm_orders b ON a.es_idx = b.es_idx WHERE DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') GROUP BY MONTH ORDER BY or_dte

SELECT b.or_dte, DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') AS years, DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%m') AS MONTH, SUM(pr_re_cnt) AS prodCnt from sm_estimate a JOIN sm_orders b ON a.es_idx = b.es_idx JOIN sm_work_order c ON b.or_idx = c.or_idx JOIN sm_prod_result d ON c.wo_idx = d.wo_idx JOIN sm_delivery e ON b.or_idx = e.or_idx WHERE 1=1 AND a.es_state = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') GROUP BY MONTH ORDER BY or_dte
